io.fluo.core.impl

Class TimestampTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.fluo.core.impl.TimestampTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class TimestampTracker
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Allocates timestamps from Oracle for transactions and tracks the oldest active timestamp in Zookeeper for garbage collection
